title: Basics of Safeguarding Children
headline: Learn important strategies to protect children from various forms of abuse with this free online course.
description: Children are most susceptible to becoming victims of abuse. This short course discusses the importance of safeguarding children, the laws against sexual abuse in the UK and the principles of child protection. Discover the common types of child and sexual molestation, the signs and impacts of abuse, and preventative measures to safeguard minors. The steps to take after a referral, including risk assessment and disclosure, are also explained.

courseDescription:
Everyone should have a measure of responsibility for the safety and well-being of children whether you are a parent or not. This course has been developed to teach you the essence of safeguarding children by explaining critical laws and guidance pertaining to the United Kingdom, proven prevention strategies and real-life events or case studies.

In the first section, you will learn what safeguarding is, why it's so important, and what common misconceptions and facts there are regarding this subject. We also cover the history of child protection in the UK, including the investigations and events that led to the passage of laws protecting children from unsafe working environments. Then, we will review the children's protection systems in England before exploring the UK Children Act.

Safeguarding children requires an awareness of child abuse, its signs, and the harm causes. The second section focuses on child and sexual abuse. You will learn about child sexual exploitation, its effects, and preventative measures.  Finally, we discuss what steps to take once abuse has been uncovered including responding to disclosures, steps after a referral, and recordkeeping. This course provides valuable insight into the complex topic of safeguarding children. Sign-up today and start learning.
